holdUxOptions.message: Back to where we left off

en.text: I apologize. I am unable to recognize the time you entered. Please enter a time including whether this time is in the AM or PM.
I'm sorry, I am unable to recognize the date you entered. Please enter the date again, in the YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY form.
I'm sorry, I did not recognize the number you entered. Please enter a number again.
I'm sorry, I did not recognize the name you entered. Please enter the name of the person including both the first and last name.
